-  MPMovieControlStyle.embedded 

Case# MPMovieControlStyle.embedded

iOS 3.2–9.0DeprecatediPadOS 3.2–9.0DeprecatedMac Catalyst 13.1–13.1Deprecated

```
case embedded
```

Deprecated

Use AVPlayerViewController in AVKit

## [Discussion](/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMovieControlStyle/embedded#Discussion)

Controls for an embedded view are displayed. The controls include a start/pause button, a scrubber bar, and a button for toggling between fullscreen and embedded display modes.
